00001 #ifndef BOOST_SERIALIZATION_TRACKING_ENUM_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_TRACKING_ENUM_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008

00019 namespace boost {
00020 namespace serialization {
00021 
00022 // addresses of serialized objects may be tracked to avoid saving/loading
00023 // redundant copies.  This header defines a class trait that can be used
00024 // to specify when objects should be tracked
00025 
00026 // names for each tracking level
00027 enum tracking_type
00028 {
00029     // never track this type
00030     track_never = 0,
00031     // track objects of this type if the object is serialized through a 
00032     // pointer.
00033     track_selectively = 1,
00034     // always track this type
00035     track_always = 2
00036 };
00037 
00038 } // namespace serialization
00039 } // namespace boost
00040 
00041 #endif // BOOST_SERIALIZATION_TRACKING_ENUM_HPP
